title: Countries with the lowest prevalence of condom use among its male population 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of males aged 15-49 for 13 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of males aged 15-49 is highest at Country Liberia and lowest at Country Niger.
The difference of Percentage of males aged 15-49 between the highest and lowest Country is 20.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of males aged 15-49 for 13 number of Countrys.
Country Liberia has the highest Percentage of males aged 15-49 and Niger has the lowest Percentage of males aged 15-49.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of males aged 15-49 for 13 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of males aged 15-49 is highest at Country Liberia and lowest at Country Niger.
The difference of Percentage of males aged 15-49 between the highest and lowest Country is 20.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of males aged 15-49 in the y axis.
The maximum Percentage of males aged 15-49 24.0 is found at Country Liberia and the minimum is found at Niger where Country is 4.0.
Country Benin has the second highest value for Percentage of males aged 15-49.
The highest Country Liberia has 20.0 more Percentage of males aged 15-49 than the lowest Country Niger.
Country Liberia is higher than any other Countrys with value 24.0, followed by Benin, and Senegal. Down to Country Niger with the lowest value 4.0.
Similar Percentage of males aged 15-49 is found in Country Ethiopia, and DC Congo.
The average Percentage of males aged 15-49 in all 13 Countrys is 15.77.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 205.0.
